text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Again…… Today was not quite the Bakushin I envisioned!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I don't know what's wrong with me, my legs are……

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Could it be, if I continue on like this for the rest of my life… I'll be an Uma Musume that is unworthy of being a role model for anyone……!?
choice_data_list: It's not like you to be so down!
It's not like you to be so down!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Could it be, if I continue on like this for the rest of my life… I'll be an Uma Musume that is unworthy of being a role model for anyone……!?
choice_data_list: It's not like you to be so down!
It's not like you to be so down!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: As expected of the Trainer who was given the honor of being dubbed "Sakura Bakushin O's Trainer"!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Your enthusiasm is different! Your reliability is different! Big difference, big savior!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Well, just like Trainer said, I'm totally, 110% capable of Bakushin! Yes, indeed!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: It's okay! If not today, there's always tomorrow! Come on now, Bakushiiiiiiiin!!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: That was a close one, I was nearly swallowed by the evil spirit of the turf!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: The spirit….has tested this class president, hasn't it!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Worry not! I shall crush the evil spirits with my Bakushin!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: No matter if you're God or the Great Demon King! I won't let you stop my Bakushin-ing!!
